alert.note: Alert for Grand Staircase; Mojave Desert (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 27 at 2:49PM MDT until May 29 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 497 AND 498... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 497 Mojave Desert and Fire Weather Zone 498 Grand Staircase. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Winds will decrease during the overnight hours and increase once again during the afternoon and early evening hours. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. Maximum humidity reaching 30-40 percent expected by Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Critical fire weather conditions are possible. Any new fire starts or existing fires may spread rapidly.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or are imminent. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
